title: Diesel shipment in two days – Ministry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Power and Energy announced that a shipment of diesel is scheduled to arrive in the country within the next two days.
A senior official in the Ministry of Power and Energy said that steps have been taken to order another shipment of petrol.
At the same time, with the shortage of cooking gas people across the country have been waiting in line for days to make purchases.
Due to the lack of cooking gas people in many areas were seen at many filling stations to obtain kerosene.
Dr. Shafi awarded salary arrears; decides to purchase essential medicines for Sri Lanka.
